definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The water feed whole-course control system used in China-bult 300MW unit is described.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了国产300MW机组的锅炉给水全程控制系统。

sentences.english: Primary coverage of urban water distribution system is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 现介绍了城市给水系统优化调度的主要内容。

sentences.english: The municipal water supply network system is the city's life vein.
sentences.chinese: 城市给水管网系统，是城市的命脉。

sentences.english: Feed-water and anti-surge devices are also used in power stations.
sentences.chinese: 电厂也要使用给水和减纵荡装置。

sentences.english: Leakage of water distribution systems is a serious problem in water industries.
sentences.chinese: 给水管网漏损是供水行业普遍存在的题目。

sentences.english: Get your feed-water as clean as you can to improve the longevity of the runner.
sentences.chinese: 找最干净的您给水你可以提高亚军长寿。

sentences.english: No corner and repair valve for water supply.
sentences.chinese: 实验水池给水没有设置角阀及检修阀门。

sentences.english: In this paper the principle and the method of variable speed water suppling system are elaborated.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了变速给水的原理及方法。

sentences.english: Atmosphere thermal deaerators are widely applied to supply water deoxygenation of industrial boilers.
sentences.chinese: 大气热力除氧器广泛应用于工业锅炉的给水除氧。

sentences.english: When a dog is drowning,every one offers him drink.
sentences.chinese: 待到狗溺水，众人给水喝。

sentences.english: No feeding pump is foreseen for external fire hydrant system.
sentences.chinese: 室外消火栓系统不设计给水泵。

sentences.english: The accomplishment of this paper is concerned with the practical water networks uprading and expansion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文结合某市的给水管网改扩建实际工程进行了研究。

sentences.english: The greater the number of feed-heaters installed, the greater the improvement in thermal efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 给水加热器安装的数量越多，热效率的改善越大。

sentences.english: The system for constant speed pumps without tank fire water supply system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为调速水泵无水箱恒压消防给水系统。

sentences.english: Suitable for boiler feed water, factories and urban water supply purposes.
sentences.chinese: 适合锅炉给水，工厂及城市给水之用。

sentences.english: Suitable for boiler feed water, factories and urban water supply purposes.
sentences.chinese: 适合锅炉给水，工厂及城市给水之用。

definition: upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
to irrigate/to pour water into/to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping)/to cook the books/to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
to water the plants/to water the garden
